t: Psalm 10
A Song of Confidence in God’s Triumph over Evil
Why*pn do You stand afar off, O Lord?*s Why*ild do You hide in times of trouble?
The*ld wicked in his*i pride persecutes the poor; Let*ld them be caught in the plots which they have devised.
For*ln the wicked boasts of his heart’s desire; He*ld blesses the greedy and*i renounces the Lord.*s
The*ld wicked in his proud countenance does not seek God;*i God*ld is*i in none of his thoughts.
